Description: Sherd of Clazomenian black-figure painted pottery broad amphora (Urla Group). (a) parts of three nude male figures to right dancing; between them an auletris to left playing the double flute; (b) head of a bearded male, dancing and confronted by two auletris; joined to another sherd.
Curator's comments: reconstructed with BM GR 1888,0208.76.b, 1888,0208.108, 1888, 0208.109 Cook (CVA BM 8, p. 26) suggests that BM GR 1888.0208.77.c may join
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B123)
CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 592, 1-2)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 163)
